title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Southern, and Uva provinces and in Nuwara-Eliya and Ampara districts during the evening or night.

title: Trump threatens bombing if Iran does not make nuclear deal
byline: U.S. President Donald Trump threatened Iran on Sunday with bombing and secondary tariffs if Tehran did not come to an agreement with Washington over its nuclear program.

title: Eid-ul-Fitr transcends religious boundaries, promoting unity, compassion and selflessness: President
byline: President Anur Kumara Dissanayake says that Eid-ul-Fitr is a celebration that transcends religious boundaries, promoting unity, compassion and selflessnes.

title: ‘Ramadan teaches us the values of compassion, generosity, and unity’ - PM Harini
byline: Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya says, Ramadan is a time for reflection, self-discipline, and fostering unity among all communities, reminding people to embrace the values of compassion, generosity, and humility.

title: Man injured in shooting incident in Ambalantota
byline: A person was shot and injured by two individuals who arrived on a motorcycle in the early hours of this morning (31), at a residence in the Koggalla area of the Ambalantota Police Division.

title: ‘Pissed off’ at Putin, Trump threatens tariffs on Russian oil if Moscow blocks Ukraine deal
byline: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday he was “pissed off” at Russian President Vladimir Putin and will impose secondary tariffs of 25% to 50% on buyers of Russian oil if he feels Moscow is blocking his efforts to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Govt to present bill for recovery of illegally acquired assets on April 8
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has announced that a bill aimed at recovering illegally acquired assets will be presented to the Parliament on April 8 by the government.

title: Sri Lanka, Pakistan and Bangladesh sign ‘landmark’ agreement to strengthen capital market cooperation
byline: The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE), Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) and Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) have signed a tripartite Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Thursday (27 March) in a “landmark move” to strengthen regional capital market cooperation.

title: Plans underway to expand domestic flights and boost tourism, says Minister Bimal
byline: Minister of Transport, Highways, Ports, and Civil Aviation Bimal Rathnayake says that plans are underway to expand domestic flights to encourage domestic tourists.

title: Warm weather conditions expected to persist for next few days
byline: The Department of Meteorology states that the prevailing warm weather conditions are expected to continue for the next few days.

title: Two dead, 2 injured as three-wheeler overturns in Peradeniya
byline: Two individuals have died in an accident in the Edaduwawa area of Peradeniya when a three-wheeler, traveling from Edaduwawa towards the Colombo-Kandy main road, overturned on a slope last night (30).

title: Deaths from devastating earthquake in Myanmar climb past 1,700
byline: The death toll from the earthquake that hit Myanmar has risen to more than 1,700 as more bodies have been pulled from the rubble, the country’s military-led government said Monday.

title: iPhone 17 Air could be Apple’s slimmest smartphone ever
byline: Apple is reportedly planning a major shift in its iPhone lineup with the upcoming iPhone 17 series, introducing a brand-new model called the iPhone 17 Air.

title: Sri Lanka-India govt talks soon on fishing row: Fisheries Minister
byline: Days ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s visit to his country, Sri Lankan minister for fisheries, aquatic and ocean resources Ramalingam Chandrasekar has said that govt level talks on the fishing dispute between Sri Lanka and India would be held soon in the presence of fishermen.

title: Shammi Silva elected SLC Chairman for 4th time
byline: Shammi Silva has been elected uncontested as Chairman of Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC), for the fourth time.

title: Apple plans to add ‘AI doctor’ to iPhone’s Health app
byline: Apple seems to betting big on the artificial intelligence once again with plans to completely revamp its Health app and add an ‘AI doctor’ like service within it, according to a report by Bloomberg.

title: Ex-Minister Tiran Alles appears before CID
byline: Former Minister of Public Security Tiran Alles has appeared before the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) this morning (31) to record a statement regarding the death of a police sergeant attached to the Colombo Crimes Division (CCD) during a shooting incident near a hotel in Weligama, Matara in 2023.

title: Criminal complaint received related to 2025 LG Polls
byline: Sri Lanka Police say that complaints have been reported to police stations across the island regarding acts of violence and violations of election laws in connection with the 2025 Local Government (LG) Elections.

title: Appeals Court orders release of lawyer remanded for contempt
byline: The Court of Appeal has ordered the release of Attorney-at-Law P. Udayangani, who was remanded by the Puttalam High Court over contempt of court charges, Ada Derana reporter said.

title: Underworld figure ‘Rotumba Amila’ arrested in Russia
byline: Sri Lankan underworld figure Amila Sampath alias ‘Rotumba Amila’ has been arrested by Russian law enforcement authorities in Russia.

title: Youth dies after falling from 31st floor of luxury hotel in Colombo
byline: A young man has died after falling from the 31st floor of a luxury hotel in Colombo, Ada Derana reporter said.
